name: Overwhelming Desire
flavorText: Enticing dreams flicker in and out of the surface of this serpentine pendant.
flavorTextHtml: Enticing dreams flicker in and out of the surface of this serpentine pendant.

primary.textHtml: Reduces cooldown of all skills by [5.0 - 8.0]%.
primary.text: Reduces cooldown of all skills by [5.0 - 8.0]%.

secondary.textHtml: Chance on hit to charm the enemy. While charmed, the enemy takes 35% increased damage.
